Checks for user input.
checkWin() - Method in class Menu1
Checks if the player has won by checking if the amount of coins in the world is zero, and then directs to a winning endcard.
Coin - Class in <Unnamed>
A coin entity which adds to the player's coinsCollected stat.

Sets the coin image upon creation.
collisionCheck() - Method in class Player
Checks if the player is touching an obstacle and which direction the player is facing, then moves the player in the opposite direction.
collisionCheck() - Method in class Zombie
Checks if the zombie is intersecting an Obstacle or the edge of the world, and changes the zombie's target so that it moves in the opposite direction.
